titleStmt.title: The Lord Keeper's speech to Mr. Serjeant Savnders, at the time he was sworn Lord Chief Justice of His Majestie's Court of Kings-Bench, Tuesday the 23d, January, 1682
titleStmt.author: Guilford, Francis North, Baron, 1637-1685.

notesStmt.note: From 1682 to 1685, the office of Lord Keeper of the Great Seal was filled by Francis North, 1st baron Guilford.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
